# The `MutableValue` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The evaluator represents values either as a Constant&#42;, or as a MutableAggregate, which allows changing individual aggregate elements without creating a new interned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::Evaluator::MutableValue</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The evaluator represents values either as a Constant&#42;, or as a MutableAggregate, which allows changing individual aggregate elements without creating a new interned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a>.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/evaluator-h">Evaluator.h</a>.
